name: Slow Cooker Cheesy Chicken and Rice
author: lxydn
summary: The best slow cooker chicken and cheesy rice recipe I have come across!
ingredients: 1 (10.5 ounce) can condensed cream of chicken soup
1 (8 ounce) package yellow rice mix (such as Zatarain's®)
1 (15 ounce) can whole kernel corn, drained
directions: Place chicken in the bottom of a slow cooker
Cover and cook on Low for 7 to 8 hours or on High for 3 to 4 hours
When chicken is almost finished cooking, combine water, rice mix, and butter in a 2-quart saucepan until well blended
Reduce heat to low, cover, and let simmer until rice is tender, about 25 minutes
Stir cooked rice, corn, and Cheddar cheese into the slow cooker a few minutes before serving
